result.execSummary:
The defendant Devonere A Johnson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Devonere A Johnson is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Devonere A Johnson was found guilty of Operate Vehicle w/o Consent-Passenger, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.23(4m).
  • Devonere A Johnson was found guilty of Theft-Movable Property <=$2500, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Each ct concur & concur to 16CF1281.
4/17/19 Ct extends probation 1 year to 4/27/20 or until all court obligations are completed, whichever comes first.

miscConds.notes: Crt signed order. Joint & Several. To be collected by the Department of Corrections.  Court financial obligations shall be paid at the rate of 25% of the prison wages and work release funds.  Restitution shall be paid pursuant to separate court order.
$453  to be paid by the defendant to the Clerk of Courts office within 60 days.
Defendant shall complete a risk and needs assessment and comply with care plan goals related to prioritized need areas identified.  Defendant advised of requirement to provide DNA sample.
$243  to be paid by the defendant to the Clerk of Courts office within 60 days.
All other conditions are the same as count 1.
